about_the_game:
Ever heard of someone being 'too angry to die'?

Meet Gideon Rageblade, the world-renowned warrior whose unbridled rage was legendary. So legendary, in fact, that people believed his fury made him immortal. Turns out, they were wrong. Gideon just died. Oops.

But death is just a minor inconvenience for someone like Gideon. Now, in the afterlife, he has a new gig. He's been hired as a lieutenant for Varkul, the Lord of Torment. His mission? Clear out the plague of rebellion from The Dead Lands. Gideon might have died, but his rage lives on. And he's still too angry to die—again.

Furious Clicker Action


Unleash Gideon's legendary rage with every click as you obliterate endless waves of enemies.

Infinite Enemies


Battle through countless foes in The Dead Lands, with each wave becoming more challenging and absurd.

Epic Boss Battles


Take on powerful bosses that appear after you make your presence felt, with the kill requirement doubling each time. Who knew the afterlife had level scaling?

Unlock Powerful Perks

Give Gideon some extra oomph with temporary perks. They’re like coffee for his rage—short-lived but absolutely game-changing.

Loot Drops Galore

Earn drops just for playing OR for slaying bosses. From common to rare, these items can be sold on the Steam Marketplace—because even in the afterlife, loot matters.

short_description: Take control of Gideon Rageblade in this action-filled clicker game. Click to destroy endless waves of enemies, face epic bosses, and earn unique drops. Embrace the rage and irony in a quest that proves dying once was just a fluke—he's too angry to die again.
